body:
Installing CuDNN 5.0 only gave me this file on MacOS
`-rwxr-xr-x@ 1 yaroslavvb  staff  58270280 Apr 23 03:19 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.5.dylib
`
I then manually added this symlink to make it work
`lrwxr-xr-x  1 yaroslavvb  admin        16 Jun 17 04:24 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudnn.dylib -> libcudnn.5.dylib
`
